posts.description: Mountain Mamas - 194 Miles - Google My Maps
posts.extended: Leave early for this one, and spend some time exploring the small towns of Roscoe, Windham, Hunter, Phoenicia, and Bethel. "Peace-Love-Motorcycles" is a 184-mile trip. A historical tour of the Catskills, marking the site of Woodstock â€™69, and heading north all the way up to the famed Kaaterskill Falls. This route cuts through ravines with twists and turns that we could ride for days.
